class_notes: Student cannot self-register. Must seek permission from faculty to enroll.
course_description: Topics relevant to the development and completion of the honors thesis are discussed. Under the advisement of the project mentor, students will complete the written thesis.  The quality of the student's work will be determined at a defense of the thesis before a certifying committee.
prerequisites: NRSG 453 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4853, Section #: 1, Type: THE, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 12-1p, Instructor: K. Yeager, Status: Open
